sys_ui_macro.name: Text search
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<link href="89ea7dfa0a0a0b860027d02d69a97945.cssdbx?" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
<g:evaluate>
  var css = new GlideRecord("content_css");
  css.addQuery("name", "Text Search");
  css.query()
  css.next();
  var cssid = ""+css.sys_id;
</g:evaluate>
<link href="${cssid}.cssdbx?" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
</j:jelly>
